Urine: RENAL COLIC  Congestion of kidneys with dull pain in back, running down the ureters and limbs
Irritable bladder from enlarged prostate gland, or from pressure of uterus
Male: Discharge of prostatic fluid from slight causes
Seminal emissions without erections, with lassitude

name: Eryngium  aquaticum
Relationship: Compare: Conium; Cannab.; Dios.; Ocim.; Clemat.
details: A remedy for urinary disorders. Strangury, etc., with nervous erethism. THICK, YELLOW MUCOUS DISCHARGES. Influenza Uridrosis, sweat of urinous odor in evening.
